title: Is animal kingdom, plant kingdom, and the morphology of a flowering plant enough from Aakash and NCERT for the NEET and AIIMS? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)
All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS)

response.answer_text: Yes both are enough.If you are in doubt you can take this year question paper and check .You can refer my analysis below: No of question from Plant Kingdom - 2 Animal Kingdom - 3 Morphology of Angiosperm - 5 Out of these questions 6 are directly from NCERT book.And the remaining are available in Aakash

It is more than sufficient …!! Only one thing you have to keep in mind that study logically everything ..!! And donot simply try to memorize without getting depth .. Note - All this chapter needs constant revision ..!! Stay tuned .. watch me on Unacademy for crash course of bio .( only imp point will be highlighted … only 15 min video … so stay tuned) At last donot forget to buy our book if you want to boost your score and marks ..rely and buy ..!! Book Name- RS ORGANIC CHEMISTRY@ Your Fingertips (available on flpkrt and amazon ..type KAMRAN AHMAD there..you will find it..!!) All the best and stay tuned ..!! ( ON UNACADEMY )
